trends: There have been no other sightings in Guadalupe
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was wlking to my bedroom and i heard a lot of dogs barking so i look around and then notice an orange light in the sky. At first i thought it was a plane since its normal to see them around here, but as it keep moving forward the light got stronger and brighter so i noticed it wasnt a plane considering that planes haver red, white blue lights flashing. When the light was almost in front of my bedroom window it blink twice and then dissapear. After that i went running downstairs to get a camera and got back to my room hoping to see something else, and i was really lucky cause a couple of minutes later the light appear again near from where i saw it the first time and then it kind of follow the same path but this time it was like descending until it look like it went behind some houses.
Summary: A light in the sky that appear a 2 times
